snippet: Greek authorities said Thursday that they had thwarted a terrorist attack planned for Saturday, possibly against political or business targets.
abstract: Greek authorities say they have thwarted a planned terrorist attack, possibly against political or business targets.
lead_paragraph: Greek authorities said Thursday that they had thwarted a terrorist attack planned for Saturday, possibly against political or business targets.

headline.main: Greece: Officials Say They Uncovered a Terrorist Plot
headline.print_headline: Greece: Officials Say They Uncovered a Terrorist Plot
